item.description:
Chinatown Main Street Festival 
Location: Chinatown
Date: June 24 ,2012 
Time: 10am-5pm
Cost: FREE
http://www.chinatownmainstreet.org/

  • Vendor booths, Chinese Dough Art, Chinese Opera
  • Childrens Chinese folk dance
  • Martial Arts Performance, Lion Dances
Description:

The Festival is a cultural event that includes: Childrens Chinese folk dancing, Lion Dances, Martial Arts performance, food, games, vendor booths, Chinese Dough Art, Chinese Opera, Chinese folk dancing for children and much more.

Additional Features: Entertainment Free, Food, Handicapped Access, Music Ethnic Audience: Chinese Location: Chinatown 149-169 Harrison Street, Boston, MA US 02111 Hours: 10 pm-5pm Admission: Free Phone Number: 617-338-6868 If you can attend at any point during this all-day Sunday event, mark yourself as a "YES" and come to Chinatown to speak Mandarin in a fun, exploratory environment.
item.how_to_find_us: Bring your own friends - come to speak Mandarin while strolling through Chinatown

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Chinatown Main Street Festival - in Chinatown
